meanings.definition: A type of agricultural cooperative settlement in Israel.
meanings.sent1: The moshavim in Israel work together to grow crops and raise animals.
meanings.sent2: We visited several moshavim during our trip to Israel.
meanings.sent3: The moshavim decided to have a dance-off to determine who would lead the harvest this year.
meanings.sent4: The moshavim stood like a line of soldiers, ready to face the challenges of the land.
meanings.sent5: The moshavim hummed with the sounds of hard work and community spirit.

meanings.definition: Plural form of moshav, referring to multiple such settlements.
meanings.sent1: There are many moshavim scattered across the countryside.
meanings.sent2: The map showed the locations of all the moshavim in the region.
meanings.sent3: The moshavim gathered for a picnic to celebrate their successful harvests.
meanings.sent4: The moshavim shone like jewels in the golden light of the setting sun.
meanings.sent5: Birds chirped happily as they flew over the moshavim below.
